title: Roosevelt Campobello International Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Lodging       There are no lodging or camping facilities in the park. Herring Cove Provincial Park next to the park offers camping. There are also private campgrounds on the island and in neighboring Lubec, Maine. Motels, bed and breakfasts, and cottage rentals can be found on Campobello Island and in Lubec.
